dolly_shot.title: Cinematic Dolly Shot
dolly_shot.prompt: Slow dolly-in on a detective's weathered face in a dimly lit interrogation room, film noir style, harsh single-source lighting creating dramatic shadows. Audio: rhythmic clock ticking, shallow breathing.

tracking_shot.title: Fantasy Tracking Shot
tracking_shot.prompt: Dynamic tracking shot following a lone wolf sprinting across snow-covered tundra under a full moon, hyperrealistic style, cool blue and white palette. Audio: wolf panting, crunching snow, distant wind.

crane_shot.title: Sci-Fi Crane Shot
crane_shot.prompt: Epic crane shot starting at ground level with futuristic cityscape, rising to reveal neon-lit metropolis with flying cars at dusk. Audio: ambient city hum, vehicle whooshes, electronic ambience.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Veo 3 prompts

what_is_veo3.question: What is Veo 3 and why do I need specialized prompts?
what_is_veo3.answer: Veo 3 is Google's advanced AI video generation model with native audio, improved physics, and cinematic understanding. Our prompts are specifically crafted to leverage these capabilities for professional results.

prompt_difference.question: How are these prompts different from basic descriptions?
prompt_difference.answer: Our prompts follow the optimal structure: Subject + Context + Action + Style + Camera + Composition + Ambiance + Audio. This comprehensive approach ensures consistent, high-quality outputs.

commercial_use.question: Can I use these prompts for commercial projects?
commercial_use.answer: Yes! Professional and Master Collection plans include commercial licenses. You can use the generated videos for client work, marketing, and commercial purposes.

updates.question: Do you provide updates when Veo 3 evolves?
updates.answer: Absolutely! All plans include lifetime updates. As Veo 3 improves and new techniques emerge, we continuously update our prompt library.

beginner_friendly.question: What if I'm new to AI video generation?
beginner_friendly.answer: Our Starter Pack includes a comprehensive style guide and basic tutorials. Each prompt category has detailed explanations and usage examples.

consistency.question: How do I maintain consistency across multiple video clips?
consistency.answer: Our prompts include specific techniques for character and scene consistency, plus detailed descriptors that ensure visual continuity across your video series.
